SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.connection

Interface ClientHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientSocket, RMIClient
public interface ClientHandler
The ClientHandler interface defines the methods for handling client-side operations. It is implemented by classes that handle client-side operations such as sending messages, joining games, updating requests, flipping cards, playing cards, choosing objectives, drawing cards, sending messages, adding new players, and sending pings.
